name: metadata-harvester
description: A discord bot with various functionalities.

scripts.build: pm2 start src/index.ts --name metadata-harvester --update-env --log src/data/logs/pm2/ --watch src --ignore-watch src/node_modules,src/data
scripts.dev: nodemon src/index.ts --watch src --ignore data/ --ignore tests/ --ignore media/

author: Aragorn Elessar
